courses.title: Deep Learning with TensorFlow
courses.description: Master the fundamentals of deep learning using TensorFlow, including neural networks, convolutional networks, and recurrent networks.
learning_objectives: Understand the basics of deep learning
Apply deep learning to real-world problems
courses.relevance_to_role_and_career: Deep learning is a key area of focus in data science, and this course will help Alex develop skills that are highly relevant to his role.

courses.title: MLOps with Kubeflow
courses.description: Learn how to deploy, manage, and monitor machine learning models using Kubeflow, a popular open-source platform for MLOps.
learning_objectives: Deploy and manage machine learning models using Kubeflow
courses.relevance_to_role_and_career: MLOps is a critical area of focus in data science, and this course will help Alex develop skills that are highly relevant to his role.

courses.title: Advanced Machine Learning with Python
courses.description: Take your machine learning skills to the next level with this advanced course, covering topics such as natural language processing, computer vision, and recommender systems.
learning_objectives: Apply machine learning to real-world problems
Develop skills in natural language processing and computer vision
courses.relevance_to_role_and_career: This course will help Alex develop advanced machine learning skills that are highly relevant to his role and career.
